Sentencas: The objective of this work is to search for a new kind of electrolyte with enhanced performance to work for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: ZnO which is one of the most important II-IV compound semiconductors is added to Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (GDC) to improve the electrical properties of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: The XRD results reveal that ZnO doesn't affect the XRD pattern of doped cerium.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: The structure is composed of ZnO and CeO2 crystals.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the composites are analyzed through electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measurements in both air and H-2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: It has been found that ZnO has a negative effect on the oxygen ionic conductivity, while the conductivity in H-2 atmosphere increased with the increase of ZnO contents.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: EIS analysis in H-2 atmosphere provides an evidence for proton transportation in the composite sample.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor

Sentencas: The fuel cell performance tests show that ZnO can dramatically increase the power outputs of SOFC.
Titulo: Processing and conduction properties of Gd-doped ceria electrolytes with ZnO semiconductor
